I want to greet and congratulate all the staff that works in our wonderful Hospital Militar "CarlosArvelo" Here I am, then, in the battle!
I join from here to all those prayers and masses for the health of all. And for the health of the Homeland! God bless you!

Thanks Cecilia! Thanks Margarita! Long live the heroic Margarite people! Thanks thanks!! That beauty!
I am receiving blessings from you from the entrance of the Hospimil. Of course I'm healthy! We will live and we will win! God bless you!

@keeping_itreal ..on them are not! The west has done a lot of harm here...but they are not to blame for everythng! Some of it self inflicted

@SydWalker. Yes,I know western media lie about many things....how can I not know...!?? No one needs to rely on them for everything!

Hello! Yesterday was an exam day. The blood profile went very well (white blood cells, red blood cells and platelets), the kidneys and the perfect heart
And now we are ready to start the "bombardment" of chemotherapy. With Christ the Father, the Virgin of the Carmen, the Saints and the Spirits of the Savannah!

I call on the Lord to be your feast and our most precious Hashemite feast filled with mercy, love, serenity and pride.
A month of Ramadan has passed. At the beginning of Ramadan, I did not want any conveniences thinking that it would be difficult because of the temperatures.
To tell you the truth, Ramadan was easier than I expected. In Ankara and Istanbul, the weather was very good except for a few days.
At the beginning of Ramadan, our people showed a great sensitivity to the call I made about Somalia. I'm proud of it, I'm proud of it.
This time two fairs came across the same day. From one side, official celebrations will be religious verses from the other side, and all of them will fall into the same day
I congratulate you on the 30th of August Victory Day and the Ramadan Feast, and I wish you peaceful days.
Every year and you and those who love health, security and reassurance #JO #Eid
